about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Welcome to Sommeri, where beautiful design meets flawless functionality.
about.text: We are a team dedicated to creating custom solutions for your business. From the start, we decided to focus on our strengths and continually improve them. This approach allows us not only to become experts in our field but also to provide our clients with the exceptional experience they deserve. We strive for innovation and quality, as every step we take is aimed at exceeding expectations and creating truly valuable products.

whyUs.title: Why Work With Us
whyUs.subtitle: We create effective solutions that align with your goals and needs.
whyUs.item1Text: We carefully analyze each client's needs and create solutions tailored to their business.
whyUs.item2Text: We use advanced tools and technologies to create fast, reliable, and efficient websites.
whyUs.item3Text: Our projects combine aesthetics with maximum user convenience, enhancing conversion.
whyUs.item4Text: The websites we create work seamlessly on any device, ensuring an ideal user experience.
whyUs.item5Text: We not only create websites but also provide support and development, helping your business grow.
whyUs.item6Text: With search engine optimization, you get more traffic and higher rankings in search results.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Sommeri creates digital solutions tailored for the growth and efficiency of your business, with an individual approach to each project.
services.item1Text: We create modern and functional websites tailored to your business, with a focus on design, performance, and SEO.
services.item2Text: We create modern designs that blend aesthetics and usability, making websites and apps attractive and user-friendly.
services.item3Text: We develop convenient mobile apps for iOS and Android, ensuring high performance and security.
services.item4Text: We help you launch Google Ads campaigns that increase your business's visibility and attract more clients.
services.item5Text: We ensure a high ranking for your site in search engines through professional SEO optimization.
services.item6Text: We offer comprehensive IT solutions: VPS setup, CRM/ERP development, CRM integration, and business process optimization.

portfolio.title: We Are Proud of Our Projects
portfolio.subtitle: Our portfolio showcases quality solutions with attention to detail, working for your business.

advantages.advantagesSubtitle: We continuously improve, expand our range of services, and implement new solutions to provide you with the best service and help you achieve maximum results.
advantages.advantagesBlock1Text: We work in stages — 20% prepayment at the start, 40% after halfway, and the remainder upon project completion. This ensures reliable and efficient collaboration.
advantages.advantagesBlock2Text: We use modern technologies and advanced solutions to create fast, convenient, and responsive websites. This ensures high quality, reliability, and a competitive position for your business in the market.
advantages.advantagesBlock3Text: We create web resources that drive the success of your business. Our solutions not only attract new clients but also ensure stable profit growth and long-term results.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtext: At <bold>Sommeri</bold>, we are committed to protecting your personal data and ensuring transparency in how it is used. This Privacy Policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and how we protect it when you use our website and services.
privacyPolicy.firstSubtitleText: We may collect the following types of information:
privacyPolicy.firstSubtitleItem1: <bold>Personal Information:</bold> your name, email address, phone number, and other contact details you provide when registering or communicating with us.
privacyPolicy.firstSubtitleItem2: <bold>Website Usage Data:</bold> information about your activity on the site, including IP address, browser type, and pages viewed.
privacyPolicy.firstSubtitleItem3: <bold>Cookies:</bold> files that help us analyze your preferences and improve your experience on the site.
privacyPolicy.secondSubtitleText: We use your data for the following purposes:
privacyPolicy.secondSubtitleItem1: Providing services that meet your needs.
privacyPolicy.secondSubtitleItem2: Sending newsletters and communicating about our products or services, subject to your consent.
privacyPolicy.secondSubtitleItem3: Analyzing user behavior to improve site functionality and content.
privacyPolicy.thirdText: We implement modern technical and organizational security measures to protect your information. All your data is stored on secure servers, with access limited to authorized personnel only. We do not share your data with third parties without your consent, except as required by law.
privacyPolicy.fourthText: Our website uses cookies that help us analyze visitor behavior and improve functionality. You can configure your browser to block cookies, but this may affect your site experience.
privacyPolicy.fifthText: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. If you wish to unsubscribe from newsletters, you may do so at any time by clicking the appropriate link in the email or by contacting us directly.
privacyPolicy.sixthText: We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our practices or the law. Any changes will be posted on this page, and in case of significant changes, we will notify you via email.
privacyPolicy.footerText: If you have any questions regarding our Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
